class.name: EditorDebuggerPlugin
class.brief_description: A base class to implement debugger plugins.

method.name: _breakpoint_set_in_tree
method.description: Override this method to be notified when a breakpoint is set in the editor.

method.name: _breakpoints_cleared_in_tree
method.description: Override this method to be notified when all breakpoints are cleared in the editor.

method.name: _capture
method.description: Override this method to process incoming messages. The [param session_id] is the ID of the [EditorDebuggerSession] that received the [param message]. Use [method get_session] to retrieve the session. This method should return [code]true[/code] if the message is recognized.

method.name: _goto_script_line
method.description: Override this method to be notified when a breakpoint line has been clicked in the debugger breakpoint panel.

method.name: _has_capture
method.description: Override this method to enable receiving messages from the debugger. If [param capture] is "my_message" then messages starting with "my_message:" will be passed to the [method _capture] method.

method.name: _setup_session
method.description: Override this method to be notified whenever a new [EditorDebuggerSession] is created. Note that the session may be inactive during this stage.

method.name: get_session
method.description: Returns the [EditorDebuggerSession] with the given [param id].

method.name: get_sessions
method.description: Returns an array of [EditorDebuggerSession] currently available to this debugger plugin. [b]Note:[/b] Sessions in the array may be inactive, check their state via [method EditorDebuggerSession.is_active].
